FlavorTextOption.Text: Newly discovered records reveal the Navigators' desperate attempt to halt the Drengin's rapid growth by concealing subspace stream entrances, shedding light on the past struggle for galactic stability and the race to develop countermeasures against this formidable threat.

The once-prominent Thalan Empire has mysteriously vanished from the galactic scene after nearly a century of influence, leaving the interstellar community puzzled and searching for answers to their sudden disappearance.
